DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial design evaluate effect Vaginal Renewal™ Program ( VRP ) , consist use vibrate vaginal wand , manual massage water base lubricant , sexual dysfunction , compare current standard care woman evidence disease treatment gynecologic cancer . In University Wisconsin gynecologic oncology radiation oncology clinic , patient generally ask sexual function . Those woman report sexual dysfunction give option enroll study . After enrollment , Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) quality life survey administer baseline . The participant randomize either control arm , compose standard care therapy physical component sexual dysfunction , experimental arm ( VRP ) . Throughout study , participant undergo physical exam assess rate improvement comfort pelvic exam change vaginal length . They also evaluate FSFI , Marinoff Scale Dyspareunia , Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy-General ( FACT-G ) survey end study assess magnitude improvement sexual function quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation The Vaginal Renewal™ Program Gynecologic Cancer Patients Experiencing Sexual Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 History gynecologic cancer No evidence disease time inclusion study Postmenopausal ( either surgical natural menopause ) Self report sexual dysfunction predate cancer diagnosis Suspected physical component sexual dysfunction participant , sexual partner Desire improve sexual function ECOG Performance status score 2 good Six month great last surgical and/or radiation treatment History sexual reassignment Presence vaginal fistula Does desire improve sexual function Already use vaginal renewal program Not fluent English Incarceration
